name: Soccer Manager 2018
description: The most diverse FREE 2 PLAY football management simulator in the world. Take on a top flight club and test your management skills against the best or help a struggling, lower division team fight for glory.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: 1 GHz or higher Memory: 1 MB RAM Graphics: Shader Model 3.0 capable card Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 170 MB available space
